contentrichtext.text: This is a '''list of rivers''' that are in whole or partly in [[Nunavut]], [[Canada]]: ==[[Arctic Ocean|Arctic]] Watershed== *[[Beaufort Sea]] **[[Great Bear Lake]] ([[Northwest Territories]]) ***[[Bloody River (Canada)|Bloody River]] ***[[Dease River (Nunavut)|Dease River]] *[[Viscount Melville Sound]] **[[Nanook River]] ([[Victoria Island (Canada)|Victoria Island]]) *[[Amundsen Gulf]] **[[Hornaday River]] **[[Roscoe River]] **[[Croker River]] **[[Harding River (Nunavut)|Harding River]] **[[Kagloryuak River]] ([[Victoria Island (Canada)|Victoria Island]]) *[[Dease Strait]] **[[Ekalluk River]] **[[Hargrave River (Nunavut)|Hargrave River]] *[[Queen Maud Gulf]] **[[Ellice River]] **[[Perry River]] (''Kuukyuak'') **[[Armark River]] **[[Simpson River
